beschaving op de vervloekte Aarde. Judge Dredd (Karl Urban) is de meest gevreesde rechter van de 
Straatrechters, met de macht om de wet te handhaven, overtreders te bestraffen en hen Ã¢â‚¬â€œ indien

enorm flatgebouw genaamd Peach Trees.

In a violent, futuristic city where the police have the authority to act as judge, jury and executioner, 
a cop teams with a trainee to take down a gang that deals the reality-altering drug, SLO-MO.
